__e: Any compassion in your heart, you'll call me back. 873-5261.
I needed your pity and your aid and then your love.
You think I'm a silly young girl... who doesn't know the difference between pity and love.
I DO NOT WISH TO WIN A WORD OF PITY FROM ANYONE.
With the compassionate look of a man who had seen much too much pain...
I don't want anybody's pity they can all drop dead, for all I care.
That's all the sympathy I'll give you. Pity's a commodity in here.
Come to my room and see how compassionate I can be.
Maybe it thinks you have more understanding and sympathy than we do.
I thought I was looking at a woman who had compassion for me... who loved me.
That he was sorry for you... had only seen you once or twice... but was afraid for you...
It's true that I had compassion for you! ...But that's all nothing more than that!
About as long as it takes compassion to die?
You are the only man that ever brought compassion into bed with me.
Have you no compassion for what those people are going through?
I suppose your claim to sympathy is as valid as mine.
But right now Sympathy is a thing we can't afford
It is a simple and powerful way to share love and compassion. It is needed now more than ever.
